result.arabic_text: هُوَ ٱلۡحَيُّ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَٱدۡعُوهُ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَۗ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
result.translation: Ni Yo Nyenubugingo budashira nk’uko buyikwiye, nta mana yindi ibwirijwe gusengwa vy’ukuri atari Yo, nimuyiyegereze rero mu kuyisaba ari Imwe Rudende, mweza n’ivyo mugira vyose ku bwayo. Nihashimagizwe Imana Allah, Umubungabunzi w’ibiremwa vyose.
